publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2211 Ms Sandra White: Jim Anderson - Scottish Leading Sports Personality of the Year—That the Parliament notes the award of Leading Sports Personality of 2004 for Broxburn swimmer, Jim Anderson, during this year’s Sports Personality of the Year Awards and congratulates him on this outstanding achievement; notes the difficulties faced by disabled people, particularly schoolchildren in accessing physical education and sports facilities throughout Scotland, and calls on the Scottish Executive to develop a strategy which will identify and encourage disabled sporting potential in schools. Supported by: John Swinburne*
S2M-2211 Jim Anderson - Scottish Leading Sports Personality of the Year (lodged on 23 December 2004) Brian Adam*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Rob Gibson*, Pauline McNeill*, Alex Neil*
S2M-2211 Jim Anderson - Scottish Leading Sports Personality of the Year (lodged on 23 December 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-2211 Jim Anderson - Scottish Leading Sports Personality of the Year (lodged on 23 December 2004) Colin Fox*, Michael Matheson*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-2211 Jim Anderson - Scottish Leading Sports Personality of the Year (lodged on 23 December 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S2M-2211 Jim Anderson - Scottish Leading Sports Personality of the Year (lodged on 23 December 2004) Trish Godman*
S2M-2211 Jim Anderson - Scottish Leading Sports Personality of the Year (lodged on 23 December 2004) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-2211 Jim Anderson - Scottish Leading Sports Personality of the Year (lodged on 23 December 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-2211 Jim Anderson - Scottish Leading Sports Personality of the Year (lodged on 23 December 2004) Rosie Kane*
